BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PIST_SC_CONFIGURATION_MST (GNUM_CONFIG_ITEM_ID, GSTR_CONFIG_ITEM_CODE, GSTR_CONFIG_ITEM_NAME, GNUM_CONFIG_ITEM_VALUE, GNUM_CONFIG_ITEM_VALUE_OLD, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PIST_SC_CONFIGURATION_MST SET GSTR_CONFIG_ITEM_CODE=?, GSTR_CONFIG_ITEM_NAME=?, GNUM_CONFIG_ITEM_VALUE=?, GNUM_CONFIG_ITEM_VALUE_OLD=?, GNUM_ISVALID=?, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE GNUM_CONFIG_ITEM_ID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_SC_CONFIGURATION_MST T SET T.GNUM_ISVALID=0, T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE =(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')), T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID = ? WHERE T.GNUM_CONFIG_ITEM_ID=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = ?
